DOC.brief_summary: This study compare 6 mm nitinol Zilver biliary endoprostheses 10 mm nitinol Zilver biliary endoprostheses 10 mm Wallstent appropriate patient need palliative treatment malignant obstructive jaundice .
DOC.brief_title: Malignant Obstruction ZILVER Against Routine Therapy ( MOZART I )
DOC.detailed_description: This research do determine new , FDA-cleared Zilver metal biliary stent well conventional stent . The new Zilver stent may permit accurate placement , may avoid potential complication last long conventional stent . The study also examine find best diameter stent compare standard 10 mm stent 6 mm Zilver stent .
DOC.criteria: Unresectable malignancy extrahepatic bile duct Age 21 year Pregnancy Active alcohol drug abuse Simultaneously participate another investigational drug device study . Allergy stainless steel nitinol Active cholangitis Brachytherapy Unable unwilling comply follow
